title: JAKOVASAURS
text: And those jakovasaur eat three times as much as normal children! I can't keep up!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yeah!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Totally!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: And they're creating more trash than we can handle, too!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Totally!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yeah!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Listen to her!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: And what about little Laura, the Williams kid? If she doesn't get that heart-valve operation, she could die.  Yeah! Yeah, that's right!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: All right, all right. It's obvious we have to do something, but we can't just make them leave.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: We just encourage them to find someplace better.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: But where? Jakovasaurs are big, loud, annoying, and stupid. Where would they fit in?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: The house of the jakovasaurs, next day. The Mayor and others are talking to Jakov and Junjun

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Memphis?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yes, Memphis.  You jakovasaurs would love it there.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I don't know. I like South Park a lot. What do you think, honey?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: G'ooh-woo-ooop!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yeah.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: But everyone in South Park wishes they could live in Memphis. Right?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Okay, we'll move to Memphis!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yea!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hooray!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hey, Jakov, how's it going?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Great, Eric! We're moving.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Moving?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Me, Jun and the family are heading to the Promised Land of Memphis.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You... can't leave. You're my friend.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh, Eric dear. It's what's best.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yeah. Let's get that luggage packed!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Jakov, please don't go.  You make everything in South Park fun.  You brought life to this whole town. It would suck without you.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: It would?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yes. These people, Jakov, these people need you. I need you. Please, Jakov. Stay?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: O-kay. I like South Park best of all. We're staying!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hoo-ray! Jakov is staying, you guys!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Outside. Everyone leaves the house disappointed

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Now what do we do?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Don't worry, We've come up with a plan.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You have?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yes. We're leaving.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What??

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: We're getting the hell out of here and away from those God-damned things.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You can't leave.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yes. Who would take care of them?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Little boy, we're making you an honorary Department of Interior person.  So now, you are officially in charge of South Park's fish and wildlife. You have authority over all of them.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I have authoriteh?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: That's right. And people must respect it.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Well, that should be fine, just fine.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Fine, just fine.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Fine.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh, no! Nothing's worse than Cartman with authoritah!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Bye-bye, now.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: The Jakovasaurs' house, later that week.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: And now back to... Jakovasaurs! on Comedy Central.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hi, honey! I'm home!  Wooooo!  Boy, it was rough at work today. I've never seen so much coffee.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Booo-wooop?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: No, in the boss's lap.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hello, dad.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hello, son. How was your day?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh, not so good. Something really strange happened.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What? You mean MTV played a video that wasn't Will Smith?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Noho, dad. A man in a blue suit and a bag came to the door. He just left this li'l piece of paper with a stamp on it.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: That's called a mailman. He takes care of mail.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh! He took care of mom, too.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You're a nut! Let me see that letter. It's from a game show. The Mayor has invited me to compete.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hi, Jakov.  What the hell is that? Who's laughing?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Eric! The Mayor has invited us to compete on a game show in South Park! Big prizes, an all-expense paid vacation-

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Wow, that's cool. I can help you get ready.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Woo, woo!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: While Cartman visits Jakov, the other boys are in the Mayor's office with several townsfolk. Liane is there, too

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Come onn, come on!  Hello!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Mayor? This is Jakov. I'm the tall fellow down the block from-

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yes. Yes, Jakov. You're calling about the game show. Congratulations! Will you do it?!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Sure! If a free trip is involved, can my whole family go?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Of course! That's the point! Just be ready this afternoon at the public access building, and good luck! Hope you win!!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Cool beans!!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: We've got 'em! All right. The boys here will keep little Eric Cartman distracted. Meanwhile, we get rid of the jakovasaurs and bring some normalcy back to this town! Ready?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Break!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: South Park Public Access. The Mayor is hosting her own game show this afternoon. To her right is Jakov, to her left Officer Barbrady. Jakovasaurs cheer in the first two rows in the studio audience. Jimbo approaches Ned

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hey, Ned! A package came for you today from Voice Box Express.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh... boy..., oh... boy.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Now remember, Barbrady, all you have to do is lose!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Right.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Okay. Let's quiet down, people and jakovasaurs!  Now, as you know, the winner of this little game will get an all-expense paid trip for himself and fifty of his closest relatives to lovely France!  And, all one of you lucky constetants has to do is answer only one of these questions! Are you ready, players?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Ready.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Ready.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Okay. Hands on your buzzers.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Forty-seven!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You have to wait until I ask the question first.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Sor-ry!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: That's okay. Hands on buzzers.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Turkey sandwich!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Damn, he's quick!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh. Sor-ry!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: No, I'm sorry.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: No, it's my fault. I'm sorry.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: No, it's all me. Uh, my bad.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Sorry.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Sorry.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Will somebody please unplug the God-damned buzzers?!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Got it!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Now, can we get on with this? First question: What color is blue?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Blue?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Uh. Blue is blue?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Awww, did I lose?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What? Blue is-? Nono. Hang on.  You're supposed to lose, you idiot!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Where am I?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Just don't answer any more questions, got it?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Okie-dokie.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Sorry, folks, a little mix-up. We're playing best out of three!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: The woods. Stan and Kyle lead Cartman along. Cartman is in uniform.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What are we doing out here, you guys? I wanna see if Jakov wins that game show.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh, he'll win. Don't worry.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: We just have to show you this new species because you're the Department of Interior guy now. Soon, they'll all be eaten by bears.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh. Let me get out my notepad so I can classify this new species.  Well, this should be fine, just fine. Just fine, fine.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: There it is!  That must be of the antelope family.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: That's Kenny with branches on his head. Why did you bring me all the out here, you guys?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Cartman, jakovasaurs are making South Park suck. You have to understand that.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Well, what does that have to do with me being all the way out...? Wait a minute. You're distracting me! That game show is a fix!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Cartman! Wait!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: (Hey you guys, wait up for me!)  (Waaah!)

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: South Park Public Access. The game show continues. Barbrady is ahead 7-0

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: What's two plus two, Jakov?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I don't know!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Four?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Jakov, what is your name?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Jakov

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh, screw it. Jakov wins!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I do?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: You and your entire family are going to wonderful and exotic France!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hooray!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: All right, everybody. Let's get them to the airport!  Let's go, people! There's no time to lose!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: South Park Airport. The jakovasaurs are being whisked into the plane as quickly as possible

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: But what about our clothes? Shouldn't we pack first?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Jakovasaurs don't wear clothes, Jakov.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oh yeah. Well, good-bye everybody! We'll send stuff from France!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Good-bye!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Werrr.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Jakov!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Close the door!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Open this door!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Eric, this is for the best.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I am Department of Interior guy, and I have authoritah!  No! Jakov, don't go!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hi, Eric! Okay, bye, then!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Well... Fine.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Eric, it's important for you to understand-.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Don't, mother! Just, don't.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I know it's hard, Eric, but I've learned something today. You see, animal species come and go. It's all a part of natural evolution.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: The jakovasaurs would have gone extinct if we hadn't interfered. Because their particular form of life simply wasn't practical.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: We can't go around saving every form of life, any more than we can kill them all. We have to let nature run its course.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Mhmm Ned, that voice box sucks!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: I know. I'm still trying to find my old one.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Well, then. What say we all go get some ice cream!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Hooray!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: No. That's okay. I'll see you guys.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Dude! I've never seen Cartman care so much about something.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Yeah. I guess he finally found something that's as annoying as he is.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: The Café Grenouille in Paris, France. The Eiffel Tower in in the background. An accordionist plays

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Bonjour.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Bonjour.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Café?

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Oui.

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Come on, kids! Let's go find some pyramids! Woops! Aaaah!

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: C'est drôle et amusant (That was SO FUNNY!!)

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: (I love its antics!!!)

title: JAKOVASAURS
text: Il est si comme Jerry Lewis!!! (He's just like Jerry Lewis!!!)
